thread.title: TCU's Boykin owns 3 of top 9 total-offense games in nation
thread.title_full: TCU's Boykin owns 3 of top 9 total-offense games in nation

author: ERIC OLSON
title: TCU's Boykin owns 3 of top 9 total-offense games in nation
text:
Charlie Neibergall TCU's Boykin owns 3 of top 9 total-offense games in nation 
TCU quarterback Trevone Boykin (2) runs from Iowa State's Brian Mills, left, and Dale Pierson, right, during the second half of an NCAA college football game, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Ames, Iowa. TCU won 45-21. (AP Photo/Charlie Neibergall) Charlie Neibergall TCU's Boykin owns 3 of top 9 total-offense games in nation 
TCU quarterback Trevone Boykin, right, runs from Iowa State defensive back Nigel Tribune during the second half of an NCAA college football game, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Ames, Iowa. TCU won 45-21. (AP Photo/Charlie Neibergall) Tony Avelar TCU's Boykin owns 3 of top 9 total-offense games in nation 
Stanford running back Christian McCaffrey (5) runs past UCLA defensive back Ishmael Adams (1) for a touchdown during the first half of an NCAA college football game Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, Stanford, Calif. (AP Photo/Tony Avelar) Tony Avelar TCU's Boykin owns 3 of top 9 total-offense games in nation 
Stanford running back Christian McCaffrey smiles as he watches the final minutes of his team's NCAA college football game against UCLA on Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, Stanford, Calif. Stanford won 56-35. (AP Photo/Tony Avelar) Charlie Neibergall TCU's Boykin owns 3 of top 9 total-offense games in nation 
TCU quarterback Trevone Boykin throws a pass during the first half of an NCAA college football game against Iowa State, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Ames, Iowa. (AP Photo/Charlie Neibergall) Charlie Neibergall TCU's Boykin owns 3 of top 9 total-offense games in nation 
TCU quarterback Trevone Boykin walks off the field after his team's 45-21 victory over Iowa State in an NCAA college football game, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Ames, Iowa. (AP Photo/Charlie Neibergall) Posted: Monday, October 19, 2015 2:53 am 
Trevone Boykin is separating himself from the nation's other prolific quarterbacks. He's the only one to go over 500 yards in total offense three times. No other QB has done it more than once. 
The TCU quarterback's latest 500-yard game came in Saturday's 45-21 win over Iowa State. kAmw6 ?@H @H?D E9C66 @7 E96 E@A ?:?6 D:?8=6\82>6 E@E2=D E9:D D62D@?] w:D daf J2C5D 282:?DE %6I2D %649 C2?<D }@] d[ 9:D d`_ 282:?DE x@H2 $E2E6 :D }@] f 2?5 9:D d_c 282:?DE $|& :D }@] h]k^Am kAmq@J<:?VD 2G6C286 @7 cad]e J2C5D C2?<D D64@?5 E@ q@H=:?8 vC66?
